price: 41. Denbiilayaasha waxaa lagu aqoonsan astaamahooda, markaasaa laga soo qaban foodaha iyo cagaha (oo lagu tuuri Naarta).
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yuʿ'rafu al-muj'rimūna bisīmāhum fayu'khadhu bil-nawāṣī wal-aqdāmi
